DOC.brief_summary: A phase 1b/2a study evaluate combination MM-151 + nal-IRI + 5-FU + Leucovorin RAS/RAF wild-type Metastatic Colorectal Cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation MM-151 + Nal-IRI + 5-FU + Leucovorin RAS/RAF Wild-type Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Part 1 : Patients enrol determine maximum tolerate dose , safety tolerability MM-151 + nal-IRI + 5-FU + LV patient mCRC RAS/RAF wild-type . Part 2 : Patients enrol maximum tolerated dose MM-151 combination nal-IRI + 5-FU + LV characterize initial efficacy conjunction level irinotecan SN-38 measure tissue .
